short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects requests to Reddit to old.reddit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply Redirects requests to "reddit.com" to "old.reddit.com" and "reddit.com/r/<subreddit>" to "old.reddit.com/r/<subreddit>"

If you would like to temporarily visit the new redesigned reddit you can toggle the extension on/off by clicking the icon in the toolbar.
